For anyone interested:

Choshu Kiyotaka tsuba:
http://tinyurl.com/29yejq

ko-shoami, akasaka, shoami:
http://tinyurl.com/ysm6sz  


Open to discussing trades for ko-akasaka, Higo Kinko
Taikan, or the Goto books.
   I hope to list a large set of Mino menuki in fitted
box-n-silk pillow, and a set of Nishigaki (Higo)
mountain pass f/k.
   I also have a NBTHK Hozon papered f/k by Shozui
(aka. Masayuki)- founder of the Hamano school. Custom
fitted box. I've decided to sell the set, and have
already sold the matching tsuba a few months ago (the
tsuba was matched to the f/k, but unsigned and of
later work so they attributed it seperately to Otsuki
school). If anyone is interested, contact me before I
consign the set to a dealer.

Thank you,

Curran
